Dialogue.Value: A dangerous high-voltage,current is flowing through,the door!
A class newspaper from the,press club is posted here.
”Arabstan After the War”,”Top Party’s Approval Ratings”,”Net Crimes by Boys”
Hmm，those are some heavy,headlines....
Someone’s written ”00004600”,as an answer in the crossword.,....It doesn’t even fit!
I don’t like to enter the,Staff Room，even when,I’m on my best behavior.
I’ll only go in if I have,a reason to be there.
I don’t like to enter the,Staff Room，even when,I’m on my best behavior.
I’ll only go in if I have,a reason to be there.
Oh，aren’t you Alice from,Class 2-2?
Your homeroom is upstairs on,the second floor.
Alice，be sure to head,straight home.
Ms. Koa?
I think she’s sorting the,library database right now.
You can access it from the,PC Room，so that’s probably,where she is.
Ms. Kumako Koa is a,really gorgeous teacher.
I heard that she’s really kind,and that her students have,nicknames for her.
It must be nice having her,as your homeroom teacher.,I’m sooooo jealous!
I tried qualifying for the,N1 League，but I didn’t,make the cut.
I guess I have to be about,as strong as you，huh?
The N1 League is today，right?,Good luck，Alice!
You won the N1 League?,You’re so awesome，Alice!
Who could have known that,Ms. Asakura was running such,an evil organization?
I could never have believed,something like that....
